title: Fix for crash
message:
Fix for crash

* Fix crash when the resource config_lowBatteryWarningLevel isn't found

* Reset no longer requires root if the correct permission is already
granted

title: Handle charger connected/disconnected events
message:
Handle charger connected/disconnected events

New:

* Monochrome now disables itself when you connect your phone to a
charger. When you disconnected your charger and your battery is still
low, Monochrome will activate again. If your battery is stable, then
Monochrome will activate the next time your battery becomes low.

Fixed:

* Crash when resetting Monochrome

title: UI/UX improvements
message:
UI/UX improvements

Changed:

* Improvements to UI and UX

title: Bugfixes and some improvements
message:
Bugfixes and some improvements

New:

* Reset option, which disables Monochrome mode, just in case the device
gets stuck in it for some reason

Fixed:

* isSecureSettingsPermGranted preference not saving on non-rooted
devices, thus preventing the app from working as intended on non-rooted
devices
* Fixed toggleMonochrome() so it works on Lollipop as intended
